description: Try our easy to follow Simple Pea & Bean Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Simple Pea & Bean Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to low and stir through bean mixture, peas and pasta. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until heated through and season with pepper to taste. Divide pasta among serving bowls and top with yoghurt and mint leaves to serve.
